name: Magical Store
description:
In a world full of magic, the best place to get your magical supplies is Goaty's Magical store. Make business with this little rascal and  enjoy wonders beyond your imagination.

***Short level test: Final project for Unity course ***

Controls: 

AWDS - Move

Space - Jump

Pause - P

Credits: 

Art & Animation: AnuarVM

Programming: AnuarVM and David Castella 

Music: Epidemic sound.
